name: MIDICIDeviceInfo
desc: An object that provides basic information about a MIDI-CI device.

items.name: init(destination: MIDIEntityRef, manufacturer: Data, family: Data, model: Data, revision: Data)
items.desc: Creates a new device information instance.

items.name: var manufacturerID: Data
items.desc: The MIDI System Exclusive (SysEx) ID of the device manufacturer.

items.name: var family: Data
items.desc: The family to which the device belongs.

items.name: var modelNumber: Data
items.desc: The model number of the device.

items.name: var revisionLevel: Data
items.desc: The revision number of the device model number.

items.name: var midiDestination: MIDIEndpointRef
items.desc: The MIDI destination the deviceâ€™s MIDI entity uses for capability inquiries.
